Ian Machado Garry’s recent win against Carlos Prates at UFC Fight Night in Kansas City has caught the attention of many fans. While fans were celebrating his crucial victory, his wife became a topic of discussion online. Here are all the details fans need to know about Ian Machado Garry’s wife, Layla, and their relationship history.

Who is Ian Machado Garry’s wife?

UFC Welterweight division fighter Ian Machado Garry is married to Layla Machado Garry.

Layla Machado Garry works as a sports broadcast journalist. As per information available on her website, “Layla has firmly established herself as one of the most popular television presenters with online audiences, fronting content for pioneering channels in their field such as adidas, UEFA, ESPN, UFC, NBC, and FIFA.”

Ian Machado Garry and Layla’s relationship history

UFC fighter Ian Machado Garry and his wife, Layla, have frequently appeared on each other’s Instagram accounts.

Much of the information about their first meeting and dating history is not public. Ian and Layla revealed their relationship in March 2021 with a photo of themselves carrying boxes. In the caption, he wrote, “Life is moving fast and I couldn’t be happier.”

Ian and Layla exchanged wedding vows in a small and quiet ceremony in February 2022. While the sports journalist announced the news with wedding photos in late February, Ian also posted about the event on his Instagram, writing, “Making a promise to have you by my side for life is all I ever need.”

The couple embraced parenthood on October 20, 2022, with the birth of their son, Leandro Vegas Machado Garry, also known as Leo. Layla posted images of Leo on her Instagram and wrote, “We dreamt of him. We visualised and prayed for him. Our love was always so powerful we knew we wanted to grow our family and add another awesome adventure to our blessed life. Thank you Leo for gifting us so much joy already.”
